Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: excess tax benefit from share based compensation financing activities
payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
proceeds from payments for other financing activities
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
proceeds from issuance of convertible preferred stock
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from contribution in aid of construction
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from disposition of investment investing activity
proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease excluding exchange rate effect
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease financing receivables and operating lease equipment net
increase decrease from supplier notes receivable
increase decrease in billing in excess of cost of earnings
increase decrease in contract with customer asset
increase decrease in contract with customer liability
increase decrease in other accrued liabilities
increase decrease in other current assets
increase decrease in other noncurrent liabilities
increase decrease in other operating capital net
increase decrease in pension and postretirement obligations
Depreciation and Amortization: amortization of financing costs and discounts
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: discontinued operation gain loss from disposal of discontinued operation before income tax
gain loss on disposition of assets
provision for loan and lease losses
employee401k treasury stock contribution noncash expense
commercial airplane programs change in accounting estimate
Stock-Based Compensation: employee taxes share based compensation arrangements
excess tax benefit from share based compensation operating activities
